compatibility.notes: LGPL-2.1 allows linking with proprietary software under certain conditions, but static linking may impose stricter requirements compared to dynamic linking.

key_requirements: Include a copy of the LGPL-2.1 license with distributed software.
Include copyright notices for the original authors.
State any changes made to the library when distributing modified versions.
license.name: LGPL-2.1
obligations: Distributors must provide the same rights to recipients as granted to them.
Source code must be made available to recipients.
If linking with other code, complete object files must be provided.
Recipients must be informed of their rights under the license.
